attributes.action: Increase the age to obtain full driving license to 21 years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the significant loss of life incured due to accidents, notably between persons aged between 17 and 21 years.Combined with the increasing problem of excessive numbers of vehicles on British roads ,this simple and realistic change to transport law would provide genuine benifits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
